trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality that represents the appearance and behavior of a table layout.
trans-unit.target: 實作基本功能，表示資料表配置的外觀和行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle> class is a common base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> classes, which describe the appearance and behavior of columns and rows, respectively, in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle>類別是常見的基底類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>類別，描述的外觀和行為的資料行和資料列，分別在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: The series of styles that represent the current columns and rows in the current table layout are aggregated in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前的資料行及目前的資料表配置中的資料列的樣式的一系列會彙總中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>分別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle> class.
It effectively sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>.
Gets or sets a flag indicating how a row or column should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，表示資料列或資料行應該要如何調整大小 (相對於其包含資料表)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType" /> values that specifies how rows or columns of user interface (UI) elements should be sized relative to their container.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType" /> 值，指定使用者介面 (UI) 項目的資料列或資料行應該要如何調整大小 (相對於其容器)。

trans-unit.source: The table layout engine sizes a row or column in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 資料表配置引擎大小的資料列或資料行，其中一種下列方式：

trans-unit.source: In an absolute number of pixels (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute>).
trans-unit.target: 中的絕對像素為單位數目 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute>)。

trans-unit.source: As a percentage of the parent container (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>).
To share equal space with its peers (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: 與其對等共用相同的空間 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>)。
